trans-unit.source: Allows security actions for <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.PnrpPermission"></xref> to be applied to code using declarative security.
trans-unit.target: 允许的操作安全<xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.PnrpPermission"></xref>要应用于使用声明性安全的代码。

trans-unit.source: The scope of the security declaration that is allowed depends on the <xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction> that is used.
trans-unit.target: 允许的安全声明的范围取决于<xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction>使用。</xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction>

trans-unit.source: The security information declared by a security attribute is stored in the metadata of the attribute target and is accessed by the system at run time.
trans-unit.target: 通过安全特性声明的安全信息的属性目标的元数据中存储和在运行时访问系统。

trans-unit.source: Security attributes are used only for declarative security.
trans-unit.target: 安全属性仅用于声明性安全。

trans-unit.source: For imperative security, use the corresponding permission class.
trans-unit.target: 对于命令性安全，使用相应的权限类。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.PnrpPermissionAttribute"></xref> class with the specified <xref href="System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.PnrpPermissionAttribute"></xref>使用指定的类<xref href="System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PnrpPermissionAttribute> works with <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PnrpPermission> to allow or deny actions by the peer granted the permission and the permission attribute.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PnrpPermissionAttribute>适用于<xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PnrpPermission>以允许或拒绝对等方操作授予的权限和权限属性。</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PnrpPermission></xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PnrpPermissionAttribute>
创建并返回一个新<xref href="System.Security.IPermission"> </xref>。
